hero.headline: Transforming Workflows with Intelligent Automation
hero.description: I turn complex business challenges into streamlined automated solutions, saving time and accelerating innovation. Bridging the gap between vision and execution.

aboutMe.headline: I love figuring out how things work, then finding ways to make them better, faster, or even automatic. I'm good at seeing the whole picture from different angles, which helps me design and build the right solution. For me, it's about solving real problems and getting results quickly.

projects.headline: What I've Built
projects.description: Real-world solutions that deliver measurable business impact through AI integration and process automation.

categories.name: AI Agent
categories.detailedDescription: I build intelligent AI systems that understand your data. These agents can ingest documents and websites, find the most relevant information using vector search, and provide accurate answers to complex questions, creating a powerful knowledge base you can interact with.
servicesInclude: Asynchronous job processing for handling large documents/websites
Connecting LLMs to private data sources securely

projects.title: AI-Powered Software Development Agent
projects.description: A revolutionary one-person software development workflow powered by AI. Transform your app idea into a deployed product without large teams, miscommunication, or technical expertise. The AI agent orchestrates everything from requirements gathering to deployment using industry-leading tools.

projects.title: AI-Powered Client Context Assistant
projects.description: Connect your Gmail to instantly access up-to-date client information, emails, and context in one chat interfaceâ€”eliminate scrolling through old conversations and stay prepared for meetings and onboardings.

categories.name: Web App
categories.detailedDescription: I architect and build complete web applications from concept to deployment. I handle everything from the backend logic and database design to the user-facing interface, ensuring the final product is robust, scalable, and solves a real-world business problem.
deliverables: Complete source code for frontend and backend

projects.title: Automated Freight Logistics and Invoice Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive logistics application to manage loads, automate invoice generation, and handle proof-of-delivery documents. It features a webhook-based architecture using n8n for backend processing like OCR and database management.

projects.title: Custom Event Calendar and Automation Platform for Non-Profit Organization
projects.description: Built a comprehensive website for a non-profit mentorship organization, featuring a custom event calendar for scheduling workshops and sessions, integrated with n8n backend automation for seamless registration, notifications, and participant management throughout the program journey.

categories.name: Automation
categories.detailedDescription: I analyze your manual business processes, identify the repetitive tasks and bottlenecks, and build automated systems to handle them. By integrating APIs and building custom workflows, I can turn multi-hour manual tasks into processes that run in minutes.
servicesInclude: Workflow automation using tools like n8n or Celery
deliverables: Process flow diagrams showing the new, efficient process

projects.title: AI-Powered Autonomous Scheduling & Execution Agent
projects.description: A two-stage AI workflow that handles meeting requests from email, chat, or API, intelligently schedules using calendar availability with human-in-the-loop approval via Telegram, and autonomously executes follow-ups: creating events in Google Calendar, sending Gmail confirmations, logging Asana tasks, and final alerts.

categories.name: Custom Tools
categories.detailedDescription: I build interactive dashboards that transform complex data into clear, actionable insights. These tools provide a real-time, centralized view of your operations, enabling you to track key metrics and make data-driven decisions with confidence.
servicesInclude: Integration with multiple data sources (Databases, APIs)
deliverables: A centralized view of your business operations

experience_list.title: AI Engineer
experience_list.description: Building intelligent systems that automate complex workflows and deliver measurable business impact through AI integration and machine learning.

experience_list.title: Product Manager
experience_list.description: Translating business vision into technical reality by bridging the gap between stakeholders and development teams, ensuring products solve real problems.

experience_list.title: No-code Developer
experience_list.description: Rapidly building and deploying solutions using low-code platforms to eliminate manual processes and accelerate time-to-market for business initiatives.

process.headline: From Concept to Deployment
process.description: I start by deeply understanding the problem, not just the symptoms. I map existing processes to identify inefficiencies, translate business requirements into technical specifications, build rapid prototypes for validation, and implement scalable solutions that automate repetitive tasks and empower teams to focus on creative problem-solving.

steps.title: Deep Problem Discovery
steps.description: I dive deep into your current processes to understand the real pain points, not just surface-level symptoms.

steps.title: Process Mapping & Analysis
steps.description: Map your existing workflows to identify bottlenecks and inefficiencies that are costing you time and money.

steps.title: Rapid Prototyping
steps.description: Build quick prototypes to validate solutions before full implementation, ensuring we're solving the right problem.

steps.title: Scalable Implementation
steps.description: Deploy production-ready solutions that scale with your business and continue to deliver value over time.

features_list.title: AI Integration
features_list.description: Integrate AI into your existing systems to enhance capabilities and enable intelligent automation.

features_list.title: Process Automation
features_list.description: Automate repetitive tasks to make humans 10x more effective, turning 3-hour processes into 5-minute workflows.

features_list.title: Full-Stack Product Development
features_list.description: Build complete products from concept to deployment with end-to-end solutions for faster iterations.

liveDemos.headline: See My Work in Action
liveDemos.description: I build real applications, not just mockups. Explore these interactive projects to see how I combine AI, automation, and full-stack development to solve real-world problems.

demos_list.title: Scalable AI Chat Backend API
demos_list.description: A scalable backend API built with Pocketflow and FastAPI that powers an AI chat application. It uses Celery for asynchronous background tasks like ingesting and processing documents, ensuring the system is both responsive and powerful.

demos_list.title: Modern AI Chat User Interface
demos_list.description: A modern frontend built with Next.js and React, providing a seamless user experience for the AI chat application. It integrates Supabase for secure user authentication and communicates with the custom FastAPI backend.

demos_list.title: Comprehensive Logistics Management Dashboard
demos_list.description: A full-stack logistics management app built with Next.js and MongoDB. It streamlines operations by automating invoice generation and document handling through a webhook-based architecture powered by n8n.

demos_list.title: Custom Event Calendar and Automation Platform for Non-Profit Organization
demos_list.description: A professional website built with Next.js for a non-profit mentorship organization, featuring custom event calendar integration and n8n backend automation. It serves as a complete platform for marketing, participant registration, event scheduling, and resource sharing within a clean and modern design.

contactSection.headline: Get in Touch
contactSection.description: Ready to discuss how I can help your team move faster and build better products? Let's talk about your specific challenges and how my combination of technical skills and product thinking can solve them.
